title: Steampunk Radioactive Aviator Costume Goggles Glasses
features: POST-APOCALYPTIC GLAM: Show off your wasteland style with these Radioactive Aviator Goggles in Black by elope! These goggles are perfect for your next Steampunk festival or cosplay event
COMFORTABLE AND ADJUSTABLE: Featuring an elastic band and sliding size adjuster, these goggles are ready for adventurers of all sizes
FOR TEENS AND ADULTS: Safety tested for ages 14+; Sized to fit most teens and adults
FUN ALL-YEAR ROUND: elope items are great for gifts, cosplay, costumes, every day fashion, or whimsical wear all-year round
EXCELLENT QUALITY: Designed for you with love and laughter by the elope team in Colorado Springs, USA; Made in China
description: Brave the dipalated wasteland and explore the world with these Radioactive Aviatior Goggles by elope.
Including an adjustable strap, and cushioned pads to protect your face, these goggles are ready for intrepid explorers or striking Steampunk aspirations.
PC Frame, Acrylic Lens, Elastic Band

In 1993, elope's founders created a company dedicated to a vision of happiness: everybody's laughing on planet earth (e.l.o.p.e). 25 years later, it’s that same delight in adventure, joyful gift ideas, and passion for creative costumes that inspires every product decision.

At elope, we’re not just in it for seasonal Halloween costumes or Christmas accessories. We're committed to transforming the world through responsibly sourced silly hats, easy costumes, and kids dress-up items as wearable art. We like to be inclusive by designing accessories for men, accessories for women, accessories for children — everyone! Keep on laughing!
